strings.evolution:
My body is hot...
I think this is it!
strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.description: A sorceress from a long line of black mages who conducted her own research in Mysidia hundreds of years ago. Many legends claim that Victoria was either a "bewitching witch," or a woman who enjoyed robbing young men of their blood, but none of these are true. She was actually a very caring teacher who went to great lengths in order to establish a good relationship with her countless pupils. In fact, they were the ones to lovingly dub her a "witch" for her strict, yet kind manner of teaching others.
strings.fusion:
My magic power...
I can feel it growing...
strings.summon:
Hey...you kids aren't too bad.
I give all I have to you.

strings.evolution:
What do you think you're doing to me?
Best not treat me like a kid.
strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.description: A sorceress who laid the foundation for black magic research hundreds of years ago in the Magi Nation, Mysidia. Victoria was dubbed "the bewitching witch" by many who claimed that she conducted experiments on the young men she lured towards her, and then used her evil ways to turn each of them into her puppets. Although it is hard to separate fact from fiction, her magical ability at least was true enough.
strings.fusion:
Not just yet...
That still isn't enough.
strings.summon:
Would you like to feel my magic
with every fiber of your being?

strings.affinity:
It's totally like me to become so mature.
Here, have this.
strings.description: A sorceress from long ago who paved the way for black mages in her home of the Magi Nation, Mysidia. Victoria was no less bizarre than the other inhabitants of Mysidia, as she too masked her questionable behavior under the guise of scientific research. Rumor has it that night after night she would collect the blood of young men, and then bathe in it to heighten her magical powers. As with other witches of legend, whether there is any truth behind these claims or not remains a mystery.
strings.fusion:
You wish for power?
Can't be helped, I guess.
strings.summon:
Hey you kids, where did you
learn about all this vision business?
